jobDescription: Title: Data Analyst Location: Los Angeles, CA Target Salary: $60,000-$7,000 Benefits: Yes, with 401K  This is a full time, direct hire position (not contract) We are looking for best-in-class talent to join a media company located in Los Angeles. The Data Analyst role will assist in the analytics process for our top clients and help take analytics to the next level. As a Data Analyst, you will become a subject expert in audience research, the measurement of media outcomes (reach, impression, frequency, verification and validation). This entry-level Data Analyst opportunity will kick-start your career in media and provide a platform to partner with the world rsquo;s leading consumer brands.  **For immediate and confidential consideration please email your resume to Mitch Kallick at mitch.kallick@rht.com** **Connect with me on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mitch-kallick-902b2836/ **
